channel.title: objectID in chat
channel.description:
How do I hide the ObjectID with co-ordinates in the chat? If I click altar it shows its co-ordinates, jad pit too and such.
Also please check : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,450966.0.html on removing multiple teleport options to single.

item.title: objectID in chat
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

client.java

find

		case 185:
			// clicking most buttons
			actionButtonId =  misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
			if (!validClient)
				break;
			if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Brandon")){
			println("Clicked: " + actionButtonId);
			sM("Clicked: " + actionButtonId);
			}
			if (!antiHax())
				break;
				resetAction();
				server.Clicking.clicking(playerId);
				break;

and delete it

ur to save your self a compile problem change the name brandon to something random like “asdfa”

Read full topic
